title: Evil Genius
description:
Evil Genius - Full Game - US Version

Included is the full version of Evil Genius. This game is pretty much un-modded. With the exception of some minor alternations to some files.

Includes:
- Full Version of Game
- Bonus Items: Recliner, and Colonel Blackheart
- Modded zoom feature.
- Evil FM Speaker, and Atruim.

This has the 'No CD' game crack.

If there are any problems, please contact me at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="9bfffefaffe9f4f8f0e8dbfcf6faf2f7b5f8f4f6">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

Steps:

1. Extract.

2. Go into Evil Genius Folder> ReleaseExe> EvilGeniusExeStub-Release.exe is the executable to start the game.

3. Enjoy.

Note: The zip archive is called Big File. Just go with it, Evil Genius directory is inside.

Edit: Sorry people. Looks like I left some of my old save files in the directory. But not to worry! There is a DeleteSavedGames doo-hickey in the ReleaseExe. So you can just run that, and all should be fine.
